name: InVID-WeVerify
description: Verification plugin to help journalists verify images and videos. Contextual data, Metadata, reverse search (Google, Yandex, Baidu), image forensic, Magnifier). @WeVerify on Twitter.

name: Google Lens / Desktop
description: Google Lens but in your browser - it's better than Google Image reverse search. h/t @Henkvaness

name: SunCalc.org
description: Make an approximation of the time of the day using shadow direction.

name: metadata2go
description: Check metadata for both photos and videos online.

name: Reveal Image Verification Assistant
description:
Forensic providing eight filters to detect still images alterations. "Web-based image tool.
Also available within InVID verification plugin."

name: FotoForensics
description: Image forensics tool.

name: Forensically Image Forensics
description: Web-based image forensics tool. Can easily identify fake or doctored images. Public access, information not private.

name: Irfanview
description: Windows-based software to extract metadata.

name: SpiderPig
description: Github - Extract metadata. Command line interface and scriptable. Requires dependencies and knowledge of web technologies.

name: Jimpl
description: Online EXIF data viewer

name: Splunk
description: Extract metadata. Report grade analysis and presentation. Not simple to setup and deploy.

name: VGG Face Finder (VFF) Engine
description: Visual Geometry Group and released under the BSD-2 clause. VFF is a web application that serves as a web engine to perform searches for faces over an user-defined image dataset. It is based on the original application created by VGG to perform visual searchers over a large dataset of images from BBC News.

name: PimEyes
description: Face Search Engine & Reverse Image Search.

name: https://search4faces.com/tt00/index.html
description: Search a database of 84 million TikTok accounts

name: Amazon Rekognition
description: Check how similar two faces are

name: Facesaerch
description: Search Google images, but only faces. Not misspelled.

name: GFPGAN
description: Practical face restoration algorithm for *old photos* or *AI-generated faces*

name: https://cleanup.pictures/
description: Web tool for quickly removing objects from an image.

name: https://calculator.ipvm.com/
description: Tool for simulating camera views (for geolocations).

name: RootAbout
description: Reverse search images on the Internet Archive

name: KarmaDecay
description: Reverse search images on Reddit

name: AmIReal
description: Github - detects if faces were generated by ThisPersonDoesNotExist

name: fdupes
description: Github - Locating exact matches of duplicate files.

name: RenRot
description: Github - Attempts to rename image filenames to their original name, and rotate them to the original orientation.

name: Phantombuster
description: No-code tool to easily scrape / automatically extract info from all kinds of social media (aimed at marketeers). Be aware you'll have to log-in and share data with a company.

name: Social-searcher
description: Search hashtags and usernames across various platforms

name: Hashatit
description: Free tool for simultaneous hashtag search on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Reddit, Flickr and Vimeo, Tumblr. With filter

name: SMAT
description: Disinformation tracker. Works by pulling data from Gab, Parler, 4chan, 8kun, .win, poal, telegram, Gettr and Bitchute

name: ClubhouseDB
description: Search users, number of followers/following, and date of registry

name: Search4Faces
description: Reverse-search a face in about 5m clubhouse avatars

name: Disboard
description: Search for public discord servers

name: DiscordLeaks
description: Search hundreds of thousands of messages leaked from 180+ white-supremacist / nazi discord servers, by UnicornRiot

name: Sowdust FB search
description: This page tries to be a simple interface to show how the current Facebook search function works, after Graph search was closed.

name: Who posted what?
description: Find posts on Facebook.

name: Facebook Live Map
description: Live broadcasts around the world.

name: Facebook Video Downloader
description: Handy website to download public Facebook videos. Copy paste the URL of the video and download it in the available definition formats.

name: Sleep Stats
description: GitHub - Track user sleeping habits

name: Skopenow
description: Social Media Investigations - name, phone, email, username searches.

name: HaveIBeenZuckered
description: Check if a telephone number is present within the Facebook data breach.

name: SMAT-app / Gab
description: Search messages, count links, see activity & timeline

name: SMAT-app / Gettr
description: Search messages, count links, see activity & timeline

name: Google Account Finder (EPIEOS)
description: Find the profile picture and public Google Map Reviews + Photos associated with a G-mail adress. Also checks for phone numbers, and checks for email addresses on social networks

name: Email Checker
description: Check if an email address has been used to comment on blogs and whether there is a profile image attached.

name: InstaLoader
description: GitHub - scrape information from public accounts. Does not use the official API, and allows downloading pictures and videos along with their captions and other metadata from Instagram. Similar to twint for Twitter.

name: StorySaver
description: Download public Instagram Stories, Highlights and Videos.

name: Bellingcat Insta Location Search
description: Github - Finds Instagram location IDs near a specified latitude and longitude

name: LinkedIn Overlay Remover
description: Removes the overlay that displays over a linkedin profile.

name: Email to LinkedIn (Epieos)
description: Check if an email address is connected to a LinkedIn Profile

name: NameMC
description: Find usernames, track username changes

name: Parler Video Uploads Map
description: A map showing the approximate (100ft) location of where Parler videos have been uploaded.

name: SMAT-app / Parler
description: Search messages, count links, see activity & timeline

name: PSNprofiles
description: Search username, see daily activity, games played, country, and profile pic

name: F5Bot
description: Sends you an email when a keyword is mentioned on Reddit.

name: Redective
description: Analyse Reddit profiles - incl word frequency and active hours

name: Unddit
description: Display removed (by mods) and deleted (by users) comments/posts for Reddit.

name: KarmaDecay
description: Reverse image search for Reddit

name: Skypli
description: Search Skype users by name / username

name: Snap Map
description: Searchable map of geotagged snaps.

name: SteamId.uk
description: Lookup player names, view (more) previously used names, and when accounts befriended eachother (Free). View screenshots of account, (bulk) seach based on previously used names (paid).

name: Intelligence X: TG
description: Google-based search engine for Telegram (includes Telegago)

name: Telemetr.io
description: Telegram channel analytics

name: Telegago

name: TelegramDB

name: TGstat
description: Searches archived Telegram channels and provides channel analytics.

name: tlgrm.eu/channels
description: Search Telegram channels.

name: Geogramint
description: Github - Find Telegram groups and users near a geographical location

name: Bellingcat Phonenumber Check
description: Github - check whether a specific phone number is connected to a Telegram account.

name: TikTokApi
description: Python - This is an unofficial api wrapper for TikTok.com in python. With this api you are able to call most trending and fetch specific user information as well as much more.

name: Bellingcat TikTok # Analysis
description: Github - Bellingcat built - Helps to download posts and videos from TikTok for a given set of hashtags over a period of time.

name: TikTok Downloader
description: Extension - Download TikTok videos. Doesn't work for some videos, unclear why.

name: Search4Faces
description: Search a databaes of 84 million TikTok accounts

name: Botometer
description: Checks the activity of a Twitter account and gives it a score. Higher scores mean more bot-like activity.

name: Hoaxy
description: Visualize the spread of claims and factchecking.

name: InVID verification plugin
description: InVID plugin provides a Twitter advanced search by time interval up to the minute. Allows documenting use cases from the past without APIs and time limit. Allows searching for content within a user-defined time range after a breaking news.

name: Onemilliontweetmap
description: Tweets map per locations up to 6 hours old, keyword search option.

name: Social Bearing
description:
Twitter analytics & search for tweets, timelines & twitter maps.
Find, filter and sort tweets or people by engagement, influence, location, sentiment and more'

name: Treeverse
description: Extension - visualise Twitter conversations.

name: TwitterAudit
description: Check bots.

name: Twitter List Copy
description: Copy public Twitter lists into your own existing lists.

name: Twitter Video Downloader
description: Download Twitter videos

name: Twitter advanced search
description: Search by date, keywords, etc.
input: twitter-account name date keyword hashtag location

name: twint
description: Github - Advanced Twitter scraping tool written in Python that doesn't use Twitter's API, allowing you to scrape a user's followers, following, Tweets and more while evading most API limitations.

name: Twlets
description: Download anyone’s tweets, followers and likes in an Excel sheet. Easy and quick to use, there’s a Chrome extension too.

name: Twitter Follower Collector
description: Scrapes any account's Twitter followers

name: t
description: command-line power tool for Twitter (it is an open source command line script written in Ruby). Highly flexible, can be put in Bash scripts to automate Twitter activity and searches. Deeper search through REST API. Output spreadsheets/CSV. Fast performance for bulk operations.

name: Spoonbill
description: Check for changes made to a Twitter account's status (i.e., bio, pinned tweets, location, etc.)

name: Memory Lol
description: Github - Provide historical information about social media accounts. Historical screen names for 443 million Twitter accounts.

name: Search4Faces
description: Upload a facepic, find similar on VKontakte (also searches Odnoklassniki)

name: FindClone
description: Searches images from VK profiles (within certain limits)

name: Vk.watch
description: See public comments left by an account, profile photos used, and very basic facial recognition

name: Bellingcat VK Scraper
description: Github - scrape data, and especially media links like videos and photos, from vk.com URLs.

name: XboxGamertag
description: Search gamertags, see games played and recorded game clips

name: Amnesty YouTube Dataviewer
description:
Reverse image (video still) search and exact uploading time. Here’s an Advanced 
Guide on Verifying Video Content.

name: RadiTube
description: A search engine that searches the subtitles of about 380 (right/left) radical YouTube channels. You query for example for "q says" of "voter fraud" in 170,000 videos, and the search results will link you to the specific time-code in the video.

name: YouTube location-based search
description: Location-based search on YouTube, but it's unclear whether it shows where it was uploaded, from which server, or only filters on keywords (e.g. “Paris” in title shows up in Paris).

name: YouTube Geofind
description: YouTube Geofind; three different search functions, location, topic, and channel.

name: youtube-dl
description: Python tool to download from a variety of sources. Select video / audio formats, quality etc. Updated frequently to support parsing the relevant sources (alternate link: youtube-dl.org)

name: YouTube Metadata
description: An alternative to Amnesty's YT viewer, with slightly more information.

name: 4plebs
description: Searchable archive of specific 4chan boards. Makes it possible to read threads after they are purged from 4chan.

name: SMAT-app / 8kun
description: Search messages, count links, see activity & timeline

name: TrueCaller
description: App that gathers phonenumbers and names from contact lists.
guide: Do not give permission to your actual contact lists

name: GetContact
description: Phonenumber ID app - draws from crowdsourced contactbooks
guide: Do not give permission to your actual contact lists. 5 free number searches per day via @get_kontakt_bot on Telegram

name: Have I Been Pwned?
description: Does email or phone appear in data breaches?

name: Epieos (Check Email Usage)
description: Checks where an email has been used. Based on Holehe.

name: Whats My Name
description: Search username on 270+ platforms

name: Watools.io
description: Tools for whatsapp: Check if number is used, download profile pic, check online status

name: Skype
description: You can search names, emails, and phonenumbers in Skype.

name: Worldwide Osint Tools map
description: Global overview of yellow/white pages, court cases, business registries etc.

name: FastPeopleSearch
description: Mostly good for US.

name: Search Systems
description: Finding public record information online in over 70,000 databases organized by type and location to help you find property, criminal, court, birth, death, marriage, divorce records, licenses, deeds, mortgages, corporate records, business registration, and many other public record resources.

name: NigeriaPhonebook
description: Look up by name, state, and phone number. Last names are partially censored for free accounts.

name: Hitta
description: Look up phone numbers/names (Sweden)

name: Rasit
description: Look up phone numbers/names (Sweden)

name: Person Lookup
description: find individuals, phonenumbers, and adresses

name: 192.com
description: Searching for someone's address in the UK, phone number and who they live with according to electoral rolls.

name: MenoM3ay
description: Caller ID service (mobile app)

name: ThisNumber
description: An international directory of white pages and yellow pages phone books, and online directory enquiries. It's a free, independent and up-to-date guide to telephone directories on the web.

name: Eniro
description: Yellow Pages (Swedish Edition)

name: Email Reputation
description: How trustworthy is an email, is it a throwaway etc.

name: Namecheck
description: Username and domain check website. Easy to see on which platforms a single username has been used. Many mismatches.

name: Swedish Name Register
description: Find out how common a name is in Sweden based on census data

name: Netherlands Name Register
description: Find out how common a name is in the Netherlands based on census data

name: Check Usernames
description: Check usernames on 160 social networks

name: The Law Pages
description: Search criminal court case details in the UK, such as sentence, hearing, defendant, etc.

name: Pipl
description: Identity information for professionals

name: Spokeo
description: People search through email, phone, name

name: Google Earth Pro
description: More functions than the web-based version. Make sure to check download additional layers, such as overlays for Bing Maps, Geonames, and Wikimapia.

name: Google Maps
description: Google’s mapping service offering satellite imagery, street maps, and streetview. Many 3D modelled places in Americas, Australia, Europe, N Africa, and SE Asia. Probably the easiest-to-navigate mapping service of all. No historical satellite imagery, but historic Streetview images available in many places.

name: Sentinel Hub Playground
description: A user-friendly place for Sentinel 2/Landsat images. Updated every 5-10 days with new imagery, dependent on cloud cover. Ability to explore a variety of GIS variables eg NDVI or NDWO. The EO Browser facilitates time-lapse reviews. Generally low resolution of 10m/px.

name: Wikimapia
description: Crowdsourced information related to geographic locations. Possibility to switch between Google/Bing/OSM. Massive amount of UCG information. Can be laggy, and need to refresh page after a view searches. Lost Google API.

name: LiveUAMap
description: Timeline of news and zones of control in conflict / civil unrest areas, globally

name: Peakvisor
description: Mountain identification tool.

name: Baidu Maps
description: Baidu’s mapping service offering satellite imagery, street maps, and streetview (“Panorama” - zh:百度全景).

name: Bing Maps
description: Microsoft Bing’s mapping service offering satellite imagery and street maps. (Streetview only appears in some countries, use a VPN and go US if it's not there)

name: Hitta.se
description: Mapping service for Sweden

name: Tencent Maps
description: Tencent Maps (formerly SOSO Maps) is a desktop and web mapping service application and technology provided by Chinese company Tencent, offering satellite imagery, street maps, street view (coverage) and historical view perspectives.

name: Yandex Maps
description: Yandex's mapping service offering satellite imagery, street maps, and streetview (“Panorama”). It also crowdsources a lot of 'streetview' imagery through the "mirror" function, from both vehicles and pedestrians.

name: GovMap
description: Very high res imagery for Israel/Palestine

name: Copernicus Open Access Hub
description: The site for the European Space Agency and for images from Copernicus’ six Sentinel satellites. Better resolution than Landsat. See explanation from the website GISGeography on how to download free images.

name: EOSDIS Worldview
description: Visually explore the past and the present of this dynamic planet from a satellite's perspective. Select from an array of stories below to learn more about Worldview, the satellite imagery we provide and events occurring around the world.

name: ESA Earth Online
description: Consolidates European Space Agency’s earth observation data on topics such as temperature, agriculture, and ice sheets.

name: ESA SNAP
description: A remote sensing program created by the European Space Agency which lets you perform various enhancements and manipulations to remotely sensed data.

name: Google Earth Engine
description: Open-access satellite imagery and analytical framework. Virtually any satellite imagery collected from NASA, NOAA, USGS, etc. is available. Moderate and coarse resolution imagery rather than high-resolution commercial imagery. There's a learning curve with Javascript.

name: GeoVisual Search
description: Search engine that lets users visually query images for similar geographic features. The platform from Descartes Labs is built on satellite imagery from Landsat, the National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP), and PlanetScope.

name: HERE WeGo
description: More recent satellite imagery from places like Afghanistan and Iran than Google has.

name: Kakao Map
description: Mapping service for South Korea

name: Mapa.sk
description: Mapping service for Slovakia

name: Mappy
description: Mapping service (and streetview in a couple of French cities [double check this!])

name: Pulse GHGsat
description: Global Methane Concentration per week

name: satellites.pro
description: Combines different satellite services Includes web based Apple Maps satellite view (which has better imagery from e.g. Afghanistan than Google has, for example).

name: 5Ghz Interference locator
description: Tool that can help indicate military radar activity close to 5Ghz frequency

name: Carte.ma
description: Mapping/streetview service for Morocco

name: Deckhair TV
description: Open webcams from hotels (??); some of them are strategically located

name: Geograph
description: Georeferenced images.

name: Mapillary
description: Crowdsourced street-level photos. A useful addition to Google StreetView. Little to no coverage in countries like Syria, Iraq, etc.

name: KartaView (Previously Openstreetcam)
description: OpenStreetCam (now KartaView) is a project to collect crowdsourced street-level photographs for improving OpenStreetMap. Collected imagery is published under a CC-BY-SA license and most of the project's code is open source.

name: Photo-Map.RU
description: Geotagged VK posts.

name: YouTube location-based search
description: Location-based search on YouTube, but it's unclear whether it shows where it was uploaded, from which server, or only filters on keywords (e.g. “Paris” in title shows up in Paris).

name: (Canada) Open Database of Buildings
description: Database of ~4.4. million buildings in Canada (comes in GIS format) from Statistics Canada.

name: converting coordinates
description: Convert geographic coordinates between different notation styles.

name: F4Map
description: Global map of 3D buildings and the shadows they cast at morning, noon, evening.

name: ShadowMap
description: Global map of 3D buildlings and the shadows they cast at a specific time a day

name: find2places
description: Allows querying Google Maps API for two specific places in precise distance from each other within given radius. Useful for geolocating photos and videos. It’s a script, no user-friendly interface.

name: Gaode Maps
description: Popular mapping service in mainland China. When it comes to navigation for drivers and individuals using public transportation, Gaode Maps seems to be a better job than Baidu Maps.

name: GeoNames
description: The GeoNames geographical database covers all countries and contains over eleven million place names that are available for download free of charge Extremely useful in Geo Tagging, documentation, and data collection.

name: Geotips
description: Service with information (i.e., road types, sign types, license plate types, etc.) for geolocations

name: Gjirafa
description: Mapping service for Albania (specially Kosovo)

name: Global Forest Watch
description: Helps detect changes in forest cover (i.e., to track deforestation). Also includes Global Fire Watch (VIRSS data)

name: IndustryAbout
description: Maps per country showing industrial plants, e.g. power, hydroelectric, nuclear, coal, oil refineries, etc.

name: MapChecking
description: This tool helps you estimate and fact-check the maximum number of people standing in a given area.

name: mapy.cz
description: Mapping service for Czechia

name: OGF Multimap Extension
description: Highlights locations from a given Wikipedia article on the OGF map

name: OpenInfraMap
description: Power lines, telecoms, solar, oil, gas & water infrastructure mapped globally.

name: OpenStreetMap
description: OpenStreetMap is a collaborative project to create a free editable map of the world.

name: OpenSeaMap
description: Sea map of borders, special zones, shipping lanes, with overlays of MarineTraffic and other sources

name: overpass-turbo
description: A web based data mining tool for OpenStreetMap.

name: QGIS
description: Open source GIS programme. Has many user add-ons, including creating 3D landscapes using LiDAR data. Steep learning curve.

name: Resource Watch
description: A nonprofit platform, still in beta, that provides hundreds of data sets on the state of the planet’s resources and citizens. It is sponsored by the World Resources Institute and other organizations.

name: Topotijdreis.nl
description: Over 200 years of maps and topography from the Netherlands.

name: what3words
description: Entire world divided into 3m by 3m squares, and each square is given a 3 word address. For example, the what3words address for Nelson's column in trafalgar square is: cube.soccer.these. This website is especially useful when referring to remote locations and when you are unable to write down a lengthy sentence of exact coordinates.

name: Maritime Awareness Project (NBR)
description: South China Sea maps with oil and gas fields, fishing areas, air defense zones and administrative, claimed, disputed zones, submarine data cables.

name: Radiant Earth
description: A non-profit group that helps the global development community discover, explore and analyze satellite, drone and aerial imagery archives. Radiant Earth is working with Code of Africa, among others. Apply to gain assistance via their website. Or contact Radiant Earth.

name: EOS Landviewer
description: EOS Landviewer provides free services for up to 10 images. More images and analysis are available to journalists at a discount. Contact: Artem Seredyuk artem.seredyuk@eosda.com. EOS is in the process of developing a service provisionally called EOS Media that will be providing free images and analysis of major natural disasters.

name: Soar.earth
description: Aerial, satellite and drone imagery on a global map.

name: Airbus Geostore
description: Platform to get a preview of their imagery and order images.

name: Descartes Labs
description: A commercial service that collects data daily from public and commercial imagery providers. Will help journalists. “We do not charge for these requests, only ask that they are credited,” as mentioned on GIJN.

name: DigitalGlobe
description: Satellite imagery vendor. Preview available via the catalogue, search tool very easy to use.

name: Planet Labs
description: Commercially available taskling of high resolution imagery

name: DualMaps
description: Combines Google’s road maps, aerial view, and street view in one embeddable tool.

name: WarWire
description: Location-based searches on Twitter, VK, and Instagram.

name: Echosec
description: Aggregated location-based searches on Twitter, VK, Foursquare.

name: Image Hunter (Apollo Mapping)
description: Find available high-res images per location

name: Geolocation Estimaton
description: Platform that estimates image location using deep learning/AI.

name: GPSJam
description: Daily maps of GPS interference

name: GeoHints
description: Overview of different traffic lights, utility poles, bollards etc on Google Streetview

name: MarineTraffic
description: An open, community-based project, providing (near) real-time information on the movements of ships and their locations in harbours and ports.

name: Bosphorus Observer
description: Ship spotting resource for vessels traversing the Bosphorus Strait.

name: Global Fishing Watch
description: No account needed. Identification of “dark vessels”, and includes Indonesian VMS layer.

name: Illegal, unreported, unregular fishing Vessels List
description: A combined list of known illegal, unreported, unregular fishing vessels

name: IMO Registry
description: Ship/shipping-related information from the IMO

name: ShipSpotting.com
description: Community website for uploading pictures & details of vessels spotted around the world.

name: VesselFinder
description: Live marine vessel tracker.

name: Tokyo MOU
description: Ship inspection/history database (PSC Database)

name: SARfish
description: Github - SAR ship detection, by @MJ_Cruickshank

name: ADS-B Exchange Radar View
description: Live flight tracker (including many miltiary aircraft)

name: Flightradar24
description: Tracking (civilian) flights. $ to go back in 12-month archive.

name: ADS-B Historical Flight Viewer
description: Look up flight history of a specific aircraft as far back as two years. Search by ICAO number.

name: Airfleets
description: Database for aircraft details.

name: AirNav RadarBox
description: Live flight tracker.

name: FlightAware
description: Live flight tracker.

name: PlaneFinder
description: Live flight tracker.

name: Live ATC
description: Audio from air traffic control towers in the United States. Aircraft have to identify themselves to ATC towers, so in cases where aircraft are trying to obscure their information from other sites, it might be another way to grab tail numbers or just generally track flights. More complicated to use than e.g. Flightradar24.

name: OpenSky-Network
description: Community, open source flight tracking network.

name: Federal Aviation Administration
description: Nationwide Plane Registry. Search by N-Number (a.k.a. callsign). Comprehensive list of privately owned planes in the US.

name: Aviation Safety Network
description: Aircraft incident database; can be searched by country, registration, year, etc.

name: http://www.airframes.org/
description: A database of aircraft details

name: https://app.icarus.flights/
description: Flight tracking platform with 2 years free historical data; highly customizable search parameters

name: Trains
description: Full interactive maps of various railway networks in European countries.

name: OpenRailwayMap
description: a detailed online map of the world's railway infrastructure

name: Transit Visualisation
description: (public) transit routes visualized - near global

name: WikiRoutes
description: Public transport database.

name: Carnet.AI
description: "API which is capable of recognizing the Make, Model and Generation of most cars built since 1995, with 97+% accuracy."

name: License Plate Mania
description: collection of license plate pictures across the world.

name: License Plate Map (Europe)
description: Map of Europe with pictures of license plates

name: License Plate Map (Americas)
description: Map of North & South America with pictures of license plates

name: License Plate Map (Asia & Middle East)
description: Map of Asia & Middle East with pictures of license plates

name: Equasis
description: Vessel ownership and identification records. Lists historical information. You’ll need an account to access information.

name: FleetMon
description: Vessel position tracking, including a global vessel and port database. Tools for the shipping industry, Maritime News and a lively community of shipspotters. You’ll need an account to access information.

name: Winward
description: Platform which combines maritime-related data.

name: Carbon Dating The Web
description: This is a simple application that estimates when a webpage was created. Unfortunately, Carbon Dating won’t show when a page was updated, only created.

name: DNS Cyrillic Check
description: Check if malicious or Cyrillic domains are registered

name: DNS History
description: Collection of historical DNS information.

name: DNS Trails
description: The World's Largest Repository of historical DNS data

name: Geo IP Tools
description: Check your own IP, handy to check if your VPN is working.

name: Finitimus
description: Finitimus allows users to find the publish date for articles and other Internet content, with a click of a button.

name: Moz Link Explorer
description: Analyse the links of any website.

name: Passive DNS
description: Collects, stores and analyses data from thousands of passive DNS collection sensors.

name: Shodan
description: Internet of things search engine.

name: SpyOnWeb
description: Find out related websites via their tracking code.

name: WebCookies.org
description: A website security and privacy scanner that, among many other features (mostly focused on GDPR compliance) aggregates large amount of information about advertiser and analytics identifiers of scanned websites, as well as the /ads.txt files.

name: Whatcms.org
description: What content-management system is this website using?

name: WhoIs
description: For domain name search and information. Try either whois.net or whois.icann.org

name: Etherscan
description: Tracking transactions & finding a cryptowallet each based on the ETH blockchain.

name: BlockExplorer
description: Following a bitcoin trail or following a bitcoin account?

name: ICIJ Offshore Leaks Database
description: Find out who’s behind more than 785,000 offshore companies, foundations and trusts from the Panama Papers, the Offshore Leaks, the Bahamas Leaks and the Paradise Papers investigations.

name: OCCRP Investigative Dashboard
description: Search 178 million public records and leaks from 236 sources on company and individual names.

name: Osint Tools Map
description: Worldwide map of business registries, court records and other info, by @cyb_detective

name: fGov.be
description: Belgian companies registry.

name: National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System

name: Court Enforcement Information Publicity
description: Chinese individuals and companies listed by the court as involved in dishonest practices.

name: China Judgements Online
description: Judgements given out by Chinese regional courts

name: Cninfo
description: Chinese public companies financial reports and regular announcements.

name: QCC
description: Private website, one of the biggest information providers, with basic registration information, shareholder structure, beneficial owners, business authorization certificates, patent information, etc.

name: Qixin
description: Similar to QCC

name: cadastral map
description: Cadastral map of Cyprus.

name: teatmik
description: Search companies and individuals in Estonia.

name: European e-Justice portal
description: In Europe, business registers offer a range of services, which vary from on Member State to another. This is a curated list per country.

name: Societe
description: Search companies and individuals in France.

name: NorthData
description: German company registry

name: OpenCorporates
description: Database of companies in the world.

name: Registro Imprese
description: The official Italian companies registry and offers a wide array of basic information and data: company’s purpose, legal email address, locations (legal HQ and operative offices or warehouses, etc). A few times it reports the date of establishment or when a company started providing a specific service/activity. It is only in Italian but has a very easy interface. The basic searching service is free, but it is possible to buy reports and specific information about a company. Same old story as for any other national registry.

name: Info Imprese
description: A second database of Italian companies that basically reflects registroimprese.it. Offers the same service of registroimprese.it, but it often reports more details about a company’s activity and purpose, which can help a lot in the investigation. It is perfect to validate the results you may have previously found on registroimprese.it.

name: Icribis.com
description: Great portal. Offers further information such as VAT n., Chamber of Commerce registration number, revenue range, estimate of personnel employed. Usually well kept and updated. Only “obstacle” (LOL): you have to create a socket puppet with a social security number. There are easy ways to circumvent this, an OSINT analyst, or just a curious person will find a way. The basic searching service is free, but it is possible to buy reports and specific information about a company.

name: Guidamonaci.it
description: As much an ace of spades as a potential flop. One out of three it presents a detailed overview of a company (VAT n., Revenue, Employees, Offices, Activity, mail). Two out of three it offers some basic information and it may be able to add in some more details. Requires registration with a socket puppet. Sometimes its data and information are not up to date.

name: Reportaziende.it
description: Offers detailed information about Italian companies with revenues over 5 million euro. It details revenue, net income or liabilities. The basic searching service is free, but it is possible to buy reports and specific information about a company.

name: aziende.it
description: Offers pretty much the same service reportaziende.it does. Once again valid way to validate data and information gathered.

name: http://www.obfc.org.ls/registry/
description: Search for companies, directors and shareholders in Lesotho. Information is comprehensive and up-to-date.

name: https://portalmns.mu/
description: Search for companies in Mauritius. Availability of information varies.

name: http://www.bipa.na/search/
description: Search if a company is registered in Namibia

name: https://publicsearch.cac.gov.ng/ComSearch/
description: Check if a company is registered in Nigeria. Limited information available.

name: https://sanctionsexplorer.org/
description: Database of OFAC/UN/EU sanctions

name: Portal da Justiça
description: Search companies and individuals in Portugal.

name: http://www.registry.gov.sc/BizRegistration/WebSearchBusiness.aspx
description: Check if a company is registered in the Seychelles. Limited information available.

name: http://www.cipc.co.za/za/
description: Search for companies in South Africa. Database is searchable by company name and company registration number. One can also search by individual director, but director searches require an individual's ID number.

name: Zefix
description: Search companies and individuals in Switzerland.

name: Companies House
description: Search companies and individuals in the United Kingdom and Gibraltar.

name: https://zimeservices.pfms.gov.zw/irj/portal/anonymous
description: Search for companies in Zimbabwe. Database requires you to register with a foreign passport number. Information is not necessarily up-to-date as records are still being digitised.

name: ImportYeti
description: Search 60 million US customs sea shipment records, find company suppliers.

name: LittleSis
description: Connects dots between influential / wealthy individuals in (mostly US) politics and business.

name: Copernicus Atmospheric Monitoring
description: Global forecasts of aerosols, c02, methane, nitrogen dioxide, and others.

name: Environmental Justice Atlas
description: Map of environmental-related conflict globally

name: World Database Protected Areas
description: The most comprehensive global database on terrestrial and marine protected areas.

name: FLASH Environment Assessment Tool (UNOCHA)
description: For identifying harmful substances and their effect on the environment after industry has been destroyed.

name: WildMe & WildBook
description: Open source pattern recognition software to identify unique whales, sharks, zebras, jaguars, skunks, fish and much more.

name: Global Forest Watch
description: Helps detect changes in forest cover (i.e., to track deforestation). Also includes Global Fire Watch (VIRSS data)

name: Global Palm Oil Map
description: Global map of Palm Oil plantations, 2019 (small holders & industrial)

name: Amazonia Socio Ambiental
description: Amazon rainforest: maps and shapefiles of natural protected areas, concessions, indigenous territories, oil, mining, roads, fires, deforestation in bolivia, brazil, colombia, ecuador, guyanas and suriname, peru, venezuela

name: Brazil CAR - Cadastro Ambiental Rural
description: CAR is an electronic public register of scope national, mandatory for all rural properties. Cadaster of rural properties that can be explored through their owners.

name: CryO Tools
description: Scientific tools for investigating the cryosphere (areas with snow & ice)

name: Open Water Oil Spill Identification
description: PDF of US dep of Commerce to assess color/appearance and structure/distribution of oil spilled on the water.

name: Amazon Dashboard
description: Tracks individual fires, and categorizes them (Savanna - small clear & agriculture - understory - deforestation)

name: Globel Forest Watch Fires
description: Fires on a global map

name: Unitar Disaster & Damage Assessment
description: Unitar satellite imagery & maps of floodings, fires, conflict & internally displaced persons

name: Explosive Detonation Velocities
description: A wikipedia list of detonation velocities of various materials.

name: MineAlert (Oxpeckers)
description: Mining licenses in South Africa alongside water licenses and the threats to groundwater, mapped

name: WildEye Asia (Oxpeckers)
description: Seizures, arrests, court cases and convinctions related to illegal wildlife trade, in Africa and Asia Pacific, mapped

name: WildEye Europe (Oxpeckers)
description: Seizures, arrests, court cases and convinctions related to illegal wildlife trade, in Europe, mapped

name: Digital Dangers Map (Oxpeckers)
description: Online environmental crime stories, mapped.

name: Rhino Courtcases (Oxpeckers)
description: Courtcases in Southern Africa related to Rhino poaching, mapped

name: Rhino seizures (EIA)
description: Rhino incidents and traded horn, mapped globally

name: Poach Tracker (Oxpeckers)
description: Rhino death's across Southern Africa, mapped.

name: Merlin
description: Identify birds (visually), through an app.

name: BirdNet
description: Identify bird sounds - find bird sounds on a global map.

name: Hornbill trade (EIA)
description: Trafficked and seized Hornbill parts in Asia & US, mapped

name: Global Forest Watch (Biodiversity)
description: Global Forest Watch also includes maps with biodiversity hotspots, including birds and tigers

name: Global Fisihing Watch
description: Tracks fishing fleets

name: Totoaba seizures (EIA)
description: Map of totoaba seizures in Asia and the US, mapped

name: Tiger Trade (EIA)
description: Trade in tiger (parts) mapped

name: Leopard Trade (EIA)
description: (Snow / Clouded) Leopard trade mapped

name: Captive Tiger Facilities (EIA)
description: Captive tiger facilities implicated in trade, mapped.

name: Ivory trade (EIA)
description: Ivory trade in Asia & Europe, mapped

name: Ivory seizures (EIA)
description: Large scale ivory seizuers globally, mapped

name: Pangolin trade (EIA)
description: Pangolin seizures globally, mapped.

name: Pulse GHGsat
description: Global Methane Concentration per week

name: Locust Hub (FAO)
description: A map visualizing locust movements globally

name: Wind/Particulate Map
description: Map that visualizes wind, particulaes, and other data

name: Aquaduct (Water Risks)
description: Water and drought risks mapped, globally.

name: River Runner Global
description: Calculate which water stream a drop of rain will follow
